name: HelloTurtle
tag_list: personalised-greeting-cards, birthday-cards, wedding-cards, christmas-cards, greeting-cards, custom-cards, photo-cards, cards-online, make-your-own-card, personalised-gifts, gifts-for-any-occasion
overview:
HelloTurtle.com offers a totally unique set of personalised greetings cards.

The HelloTurtle.com’s website has been completely designed by HelloTurtle.com’s software engineers to make the process of creating and paying for customers’ own designs as easy as possible. HelloTurtle.com has thousands of cards to choose from, with new designs being added every day, that’s without customers creating their own Photo design or Spoof card.

HelloTurtle.com produces all of their cards in their own facility and many of their personalised greetings cards are created in house by their designers in the Vale of Belvoir. HelloTurtle.com carefully places customers’ cards in a nice envelope and post them out to their selected destination via the Royal Mail service in the United Kingdom the same day if their orders have been received before 2pm on Monday to Friday.

HelloTurtle.com is a trading name of Signature Greetings Limited (registered in England and Wales under the company registration number 07444011).

HelloTurtle.com is a registered trademark.
